00001 #ifndef SDB_HASH_HEADER_H_
00002 #define SDB_HASH_HEADER_H_
00003 
00004 #include <iostream>
00005 
00006 using namespace std;
00007 
00008 NS_IZENELIB_AM_BEGIN
00009 
00014 struct ShFileHeader {
00015         int magic; //set it as 0x061561, check consistence.                     
00016         size_t bucketSize;
00017         //size_t directorySize;
00018         size_t dpow;
00019         size_t cacheSize;
00020         size_t numItems;
00021         size_t nBlock; //the number of bucket allocated, it indicates the file size: sizeof(ShFileHeader) + nblock*bucketSize
00022 
00023         ShFileHeader()
00024         {
00025                 magic = 0x061561;
00026                 bucketSize = 2048;
00027                 //directorySize =8192*8;
00028                 dpow = 15;
00029                 cacheSize = 1000000;
00030                 numItems = 0;
00031                 nBlock = 0;
00032         }
00033 
00034         void display(std::ostream& os = std::cout) {
00035                 os<<"magic: "<<magic<<endl;
00036                 os<<"bucketSize: "<<bucketSize<<endl;
00037                 os<<"dpow: "<<dpow<<endl;
00038                 os<<"directorySize: "<<(1<<dpow)<<endl;
00039                 os<<"cacheSize: "<<cacheSize<<endl;
00040                 os<<"numItem: "<<numItems<<endl;
00041                 os<<"nBlock: "<<nBlock<<endl;
00042                 
00043                 os<<endl;
00044                 os<<"file size: "<<nBlock*bucketSize+sizeof(ShFileHeader)<<"bytes"<<endl;
00045                 if(nBlock != 0) {
00046                         os<<"average items number in bucket: "<<double(numItems)/double(nBlock)<<endl;          
00047                         os<<"average length of bucket chain: "<< double(nBlock)/double(2<<dpow)<<endl;
00048                 }
00049         }
00050 
00051         bool toFile(FILE* f)
00052         {
00053                 if ( 0 != fseek(f, 0, SEEK_SET) )
00054                 return false;
00055 
00056                 fwrite(this, sizeof(ShFileHeader), 1, f);
00057                 return true;
00058 
00059         }
00060 
00061         bool fromFile(FILE* f)
00062         {
00063                 if ( 0 != fseek(f, 0, SEEK_SET) )
00064                 return false;
00065                 fread(this, sizeof(ShFileHeader), 1, f);
00066                 return true;
00067         }
00068 };
00069 
00070 NS_IZENELIB_AM_END
00071 
00072 #endif /*SDB_HASH_HEADER_H_*/
